option.para: Override the base-uri of the xproc pipeline file (to simulate executing a remote pipeline from a local file)
No input. Do not read any input ports for pipeline input
Expect input documents to be wrapped by a root node. This allows a sequence of documents on an input port.
Wrap output documents with a root node "wrap". This allows a sequence of documents on an output port
Pass an option to the pipeline. May occur multiple times
